name: Property Direction
tag_list: buy-property, real-estate-agent, real-estate-buyers, real-estate-builders, residential-property, commercial-real-estate
overview: Property Direction is an online portal, serving the real estate world. It is an emerging company having its headquarters based in Mumbai. Visitors can buy and sell properties, and can even lease or rent residential and commercial properties. With its presence realized in all over India, people get good opportunities to buy, sell and rent real estate property in India. This portal has grown massively for enormous trust and support. In order to make it more interactive, the company has provided features such as social networking in real estate, news updates and search results. The company is associated with some of the renowned developers such as Lodha, Elite, GrowHomes, and Greenscape. Seeker can visit this portal and search for satisfied result. Apart from buying and selling, there are many other activities that this portal offers for safe and satisfied dealing. So, find out your requirement and enjoy the best deals at www.propertydirections.com.

offices.address1: Property Direction, Balaji Group, SS-3 / 230, Sector - 2,
